Immerse yourself in the art and culture scene, enjoy a range of recreational activities, and experience the lively nightlife. Please note that photo ID is required for community access.

Begin Mini-Page 592787

Begin Mini-Page 592788
About Broken Sound
A Unique Brand of Luxury Living
Indulge in a lifestyle that embodies the perfect balance of active living, professional success, athletic excellence, and socializing at our luxurious, gated golf and country club community. Nestled within our community are 28 distinct residential villages, each boasting its own distinctive character and charm. Discover your dream home and start living your best life today!
Our community boasts an impressive array of award-winning amenities, just minutes away from your doorstep, including a two-acre poolscape with a bistro, a 38,000-square foot, LEED Certified Moonstone Spa & Fitness Center, and 22 tennis courts and 8 pickleball courts. And let's not forget about our two world-renowned golf courses, both GEO Certified and Audubon Sanctuary Certified, with The Old Course hosting the PGA Tour Champions season opener.
Our private club is renowned for its signature warmth, elegance, and genuine hospitality. We take pride in delivering a lifestyle that is second to none. Visit our website today to explore our community and schedule a tour. Simply complete the form below to get started on your journey to the ultimate living experience.
End Mini-Page 592788
container
Begin Mini-Page 592789
End Mini-Page 592789
Begin Mini-Page 592790
The Broken Sound Story
How the Community Got Its Name
Nestled in the heart of Boca Raton, the idyllic and breathtaking setting of our community never fails to amaze both residents and visitors alike. Even Joe Lee, the designer of the club's original Old Course, was captivated by its beauty. "I've never seen such a serene and peaceful location in the middle of a bustling city," remarked Lee, noting that the only sound breaking the silence was the gentle swish of a golf club. His words perfectly encapsulate the enchanting allure of our club, and it was from that moment on that the name "Broken Sound" became synonymous with unparalleled tranquility and beauty.
End Mini-Page 592790

Begin Mini-Page 592758
Broken Sound Club Events
Incredible Occasions Create Indelible Memories
Experience unforgettable events that will leave a lasting impression. Our team of passionate professionals is committed to bringing your vision to life, whether it's a social celebration like a wedding or birthday, a corporate meeting or company gathering, or a grand fundraising affair.
We offer a variety of stunning event venues paired with exceptional culinary offerings, ensuring that every detail is taken care of for your special occasion. Our goal is to make sure that every event at Broken Sound Club is a memorable one, leaving you with an experience of a lifetime.
Contact us today by completing our Event Inquiry form to learn more and start planning your next unforgettable event with the Broken Sound Club Events Team.
Private Event Spaces
Contact Us
End Mini-Page 592758
container
Begin Mini-Page 593146
End Mini-Page 593146
Begin Mini-Page 593147
Weddings
Say “I Do” to the Ideal Reception
Experience the magic of love and create unforgettable memories with Broken Sound's masterful catering and elegant event facilities. As your "happy place," Broken Sound is the perfect choice for couples beginning a harmonious new life together. Our picture-perfect venue offers unforgettable weddings and receptions with on-site catering and event planning services. Let us help you make your day everything you desire, from intimate affairs to large-scale events.
End Mini-Page 593147
end intro
Begin Mini-Page 593152
End Mini-Page 593152
Begin Mini-Page 593153
Corporate Events
Keeping Company With Your Company
In the fast-paced world of business, every choice has an impact. That's why it's crucial to make the right decisions when planning corporate gatherings. Whether it's a conference, team-building activity, dinner, or celebration, the event must be executed flawlessly and represent your brand perfectly. That's where Broken Sound comes in.
Our venue is guaranteed to impress, providing an exceptional location for your next corporate event. From high-powered meetings and conferences to lively company outings and celebrations, every event at Broken Sound is a significant and memorable occasion. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your event is a resounding success and leaves a lasting impression on all attendees.
End Mini-Page 593153
end intro
Discover the Lifestyle at
@BrokenSoundClub

Begin Mini-Page 592947
End Mini-Page 592947
Begin Mini-Page 592948
Private Club Membership in Boca Raton, Florida
Why Live Life Anywhere Else When You Can Enjoy the Signature Private Club Membership Experience at Broken Sound Club!
Broken Sound Club's commitment to sustainability and environmental preservation is truly commendable. The GEO and Audubon certifications are a testament to the club's efforts to create a golfing experience that is both enjoyable and eco-friendly. Winning the "Environmental Leaders in Golf Award" is a significant achievement and reflects the club's dedication to being a leader in the industry for sustainable practices.
End Mini-Page 592948
container
Begin Mini-Page 592949
End Mini-Page 592949
Begin Mini-Page 592950
Sports Membership
As a Social/Tennis Member at Broken Sound Club, you'll enjoy a wealth of privileges, including full access to our exquisite dining options, state-of-the-art fitness and spa facilities, sparkling aquatics, and expansive tennis facilities. Additionally, you'll be able to take advantage of our extensive calendar of member activities, which includes interest clubs, on-site and off-site entertainment, day trips to museums, and much more. We believe in fostering a vibrant and inclusive community at Broken Sound Club, and as a Social/Tennis Member, you'll be welcomed with open arms.
End Mini-Page 592950
end intro
Discover the Lifestyle at
@BrokenSoundClub
